tool.name: WisecondorX convert
tool.command: @pipefail@ ln -f -s $bam.metadata.bam_index ${bam}.bai && printf "Creating 5kb bins for file $bam.element_identifier" && WisecondorX convert $bam ${bam}.npz

param.name: bam
param.label: Bam input
param.help: input Bam is converted in .npz file

tool.help:
wisecondorx_reference ============================
Generate npz file from bam file.
Inputs --------
A bam file
